TEXT.TITLE: QUIXOTE <QUIX.O> UNIT, BATTELLE FORM AGREEMENT
TEXT.BODY: Quixote Corp said its Ocean Scientific Inc subsidiary and the Columbus, Ohio, division of Battelle Memorial Institute signed a joint marketing agreement under which the organizations may provide joint services for specific research and development programs for healthcare and instrumentation. The agreement will allow Ocean Scientific to offer its clients greater capability for designing new instrumentation systems, Quixote said. Reuter
